snippet: Mayor Tony F. Mack has been accused by federal prosecutors of involvement in a deal to take more than $119,000 in the below-market sale of city property.
abstract: Trenton Mayor Tony F Mack is arrested and charged in what federal prosecutors describe as a scheme to accept more than $119,000 in bribes in exchange for selling city property at a fraction of its value; two other men, who were secretly cooperating with federal prosecutors and remain unnamed, are also arrested.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Tony F. Mack has been accused by federal prosecutors of involvement in a deal to take more than $119,000 in the below-market sale of city property.

headline.seo: Trenton Mayor, Tony Mack, Arrested in Bribery Scheme
headline.main: Trenton Mayor and Two Others Are Charged in Bribery Case
headline.print_headline: Trenton Mayor and Two Others Are Charged in Bribery Case
